hooks.command: if grep -qiE '(roadmap|continua|next task|prossimo task)' /tmp/.claude-last-prompt 2>/dev/null; then echo '[SKILL REMINDER] The user wants to work on the roadmap. Use the roadmap-pilot skill instructions from .claude/skills/roadmap-pilot/SKILL.md. Execute exactly ONE task, mark it done, commit, and hand off.'; fi
if [ -f CLAUDE.md ] && grep -q '^\- \[x\]' CLAUDE.md; then DONE=$(grep -c '^\- \[x\]' CLAUDE.md); TOTAL=$(grep -c '^\- \[.\]' CLAUDE.md); echo "Roadmap progress: ${DONE}/${TOTAL}"; fi
